title: Southside Junk Yard, Minneapolis
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

See sign on back of mount, in pencil: [Wayne R. Lazorik 196
description: man wearing a cap with his hands in his jacket pockets, standing in the doorway of a run-down corrugated metal building; eight cast iron pans hang above door; sign written in chalk on a board, hanging on door latch, reads: "Working in the Back"
